Wildrider chuckled evily again. He then looked at the shifting robot 
in the Pod. "Ha ha ha, we havent been here long ourselves, but you are 
a Decepticon, I just dont know what happened to your markings." He 
then pointed to the pod, "But that obviously is a Decepticon Pod, 
hmmmmm, do you want us to check your memory banks for what happened?" 
he said, smilling a wicked smile.
